format: html

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
```


#IPRED vs Time
```{r}
setwd('C:/Users/Esther Aderinsola/Documents/pharmacometrics/Modeling/Project')
dat <- read.table (file='run12_sdtab', skip=1, header=T)
plot (x=dat$IPRED, y=dat$CONC_M7, type='p', pch=19, col='darkblue',
      xlab='IPRED', ylab='CONC_M7', main='IPRED vs OBS' )
```

# Population Prediction (PRED) vs OBS
```{r}
setwd('C:/Users/Esther Aderinsola/Documents/pharmacometrics/Modeling/Project')
dat <- read.table (file='run12_sdtab', skip=1, header=T)
plot (x=dat$PRED, y=dat$CONC_M7, type='p', pch=19, col='darkblue',
      xlab='PRED', ylab='CONC_M7', main='PRED vs OBS' ) +
  abline(1, 1, lty=2)
```


# Logaritmic scale Population Prediction (PRED) vs OBS
```{r}
setwd('C:/Users/Esther Aderinsola/Documents/pharmacometrics/Modeling/Project')
dat <- read.table (file='run12_sdtab', skip=1, header=T)
plot (x=dat$PRED, y=dat$CONC_M7, type='p', pch=19, col='darkblue',
      xlab='PRED', ylab='CONC_M7', main='PRED vs OBS' , log='xy') +
  abline(1, 1, lty=2)
```

#WRES vs PRED
```{r}
setwd('C:/Users/Esther Aderinsola/Documents/pharmacometrics/Modeling/Project')
dat <- read.table (file='run12_sdtab', skip=1, header=T)
plot (x=dat$PRED, y=dat$WRES, type='p', pch=16, col='darkblue',
      xlab='PRED', ylab='WRES', main='PRED vs WRES', ylim = c(-15, 15)) +
  
  abline(h=0, lty=2)
 abline(h = -3, lty = 2) # -3 line 
 abline(h = 3, lty = 2) # +3 line
```

#PRED vs RES
```{r}
setwd('C:/Users/Esther Aderinsola/Documents/pharmacometrics/Modeling/Project')
dat <- read.table (file='run12_sdtab', skip=1, header=T)
plot (x=dat$PRED, y=dat$WRES, type='p', pch=19, col='darkblue',
```

#WRES vs Time after Dose
```{r}
setwd('C:/Users/Esther Aderinsola/Documents/pharmacometrics/Modeling/Project')
dat <- read.table (file='run12_sdtab', skip=1, header=T)
plot (x=dat$TIME, y=dat$WRES, type='p', pch=10, col='darkred',
      xlab='TIME', ylab='WRES', main='WRES vs Time', ylim = c(-10, 10)) +
  abline(h=0, lty=2)
```
